page.title: 04RETIREMENT, NEW WHITTINGTON.
page.content: The grounds of Whittington House have been developed as a "Life Style Village" for retired people. Properties cost from Â£18900 to Â£28750. Annual service charge Â£400. This covers external maintenance, gardening, window cleaning, Community Centre, self-service laundry, alarm system, warden service. There is a guest bedroom & a monthly doctor's surgery. Ernest Jones, aged 77, retired electrician from Manchester & his wife Molly, 79, have a bungalow. Arrived 18 months ago to be near their married daughter in Sheffield. Have 1 bedroom, living room, kitchen & bath. No back door. All electric with storage heaters. Mrs.Jones glad she came, but misses private garden and room to do her dress-making. Mr.Jones misses friends.
